fields.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
fields.description: +60 Armor +30 Ability Power +10% Cooldown Reduction +500 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack (on hit) deals bonus physical damage equal to 125% of base Attack Damage to enemies near the target, and creates a field around the target for 2 seconds that slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% (1.5 second cooldown, half-sized field if ranged). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
